user_request: Show the shopping cart on amazon. Add "macbook air" to the cart on amazon
screen_desc: The screenshot shows a product page for a MacBook Air with a price of $967.50. The user can select from three color options: Silver, Gold, and Space Gray. It also offers two configuration options, with or without AppleCare+, affecting the price. There is a note indicating only 13 units are left in stock. Additionally, a delivery issue is shown, stating the item cannot be shipped to the selected location.
history_actions: click on the "Chrome" browser app icon located at the lower right part of the screen.
click on the browser's address/URL bar located at the middle and top part of the screen.
click on the second search suggestion located at middle and upper part of the screen.
click on the shopping cart icon located at the top right.
click on the shopping cart icon located at the top right.
click on the shopping cart icon located at the top right.
click on the search bar located at the upper middle part of the screen.
click on the first search result with content "2020 Apple MacBook Air Laptop Apple M1 Chip, 13" Retina Display,,8GB RAM, 256GB SSD Storage," located at the upper right
action_plan: Confirm if the current website is Amazon.
If the current website is Amazon, look for and click the 'Add to Cart' button.
If an 'Add to Cart' button is not visible, scroll down to see if it appears.
If the current website is not Amazon, navigate back to the search results and choose an Amazon link corresponding to the MacBook Air product.

action_with_memory.Next Single Step Action: Scroll down to find the 'Add to Cart' button.
